thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SFK Polkap Signs Investment Agreement With FRAM Fund

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SFK Polkap Signs Investment Agreement With FRAM Fund
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - SFK POLKAP SA:
* SIGNS INVESTMENT AGREEMENT WITH FRAM CLOSED INVESTMENT FUND
* UNDER AGREEMENT CO TO OFFER FRAM 7.5-8.0 MILLION NEW SERIES F SHARES FOR ACQUISITION
* SERIES F SHARES TO BE ACQUIRED BY FRAM IF CO REDUCES ITS DEBT
* SERIES F SHARES TO BEAR NOMINAL VALUE OF 0.50 ZLOTY PER SHARE
* SAYS WILL TAKE ACTION WITH ITS CREDITING BANK AND BONDHOLDERS TO REDUCE COâ€˜S DEBT
* UNDER INVESTMENT DEAL CHANGE OF TERMS OF INDEBTEDNESS MUST TAKE PLACE BY JUNE 30, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
